QuestData.Title: Look Who I Found!
QuestData.Description:
Behold this magnificent creature!
Siloh says we have no resources for another of my "abnormal pets."
But we may be able to alter E'rnee so that I can keep him. Strange interactions occur between creatures and this environment. Perhaps we can make him smaller.
I know a spot where we can conduct our research. There are flowers nearby called chromatic rosids that might trigger a reaction. Why don't you collect some on the way?
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve $2oa Chromatic Rosids near Dimensional Falls.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps we should do some experiments with other subjects before trying things out on E'rnee.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver the Chromatic Rosids to Tamra
